game.name: The NOexistenceN of you AND me
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

reviewHighlights.text: ㅈㄴ 소름돋는 게임이네 과하게 몰입하면 큰일날듯 진짜로
올해의 크리스마스는 내가 여친이 되기로 했어요
